adDetails: Hi, I have a PICK UP TRUCK ready to help you move or haul almost anything! I can move single items, small moves, Bed/ Box springs, apartments, houses, office relocation, cargo pick up, yard supplies, etc. Mattress and boxsprings, couches, TV"s, dressers, random furniture, heavy or bulky items, etc. COUCH / MATTRESS MOVES, Single item moves, Store pick up or return, I can also meet you at the sellers house for items purchased here on craigslist. ""SMALL MOVES"" OR ""SINGLE ITEM"" MOVES NOT A PROBLEM!! When using my service you receive my labor and my truck. I bring with me all tools for your job: ropes, straps, tie downs, pads, etc. Additional workers available if needed for bigger jobs (LOADING/UNLOADING PODS, UHAULS, STORAGE). References are also available. CALL Mr Urdy show contact info FOR A QUOTE OR QUESTIONS.... NO EMAILS I'M HERE TO HELP YOU WITH ANYTHING YOU MIGHT NEED HELP WITH.. FROM HOUSE CLEANING TO HAULING THINGS AWAY MOVING SERVICES ANYTIME DAY OR NIGHT WE NEGOTIATE PRICE WITH YOU TO SUIT YOUR BUDGET FAST, COURTEOUS, ENGLISH SPEAKING STAFF BEST RATES IN ALL BAY AREA HANDS DOWN WE MOVING THINGS OTHERS WONT TOUCH I'M A HANDYMAN WITH A TRUCK FOR YOU. DO YOU NEED SOMETHING TAKING AWAY,PICKED OR PUT TOGETHER. I EVEN DO SMALL HOME REPAIRS ..WHATEVER YOU MIGHT NEED HELP WITH, JUST ASK SO I CAN SEE IF I CAN HELP YOU FOR A SMALL FEE... SO CALL SO I CAN SEE IF I CAN HELP YOU FOR A SMALL FEE show contact info MACK
